name: Out Recoiled
description:
Do you like suffering through many trials and tribulations? Are you a total masochist? If yes, this is the game for you! Try Out Recoiled and dive into a game requiring mass concentration, extreme precision, constant anger, and calm ambient rain sounds.

The game revolves around a robot attempting to traverse this post apocalyptic world without humans. The only moving creatures are the robots that either follow their broken code or drones that pursue to attempt to destroy the player.

Controls

  • A & D for movement
  • Space & W to jump
  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB to shoot a normal shot
  • RMB to shoot a charged shot

Features

  • Utilize a powerful shotgun that recoils you away from enemies
  • Four unique enemy types
  • Unique levels gradually increasing in difficulty

The game is created by Liam Vallesfin as a submitted project for a University course within the span of 2 months.
